ai-anya-e1210n1:1207_0: you also will give up even one in return.
ai-anya-e1210n1:1209_0: and was shining with knowledge, he proclaimed.
ai-anya-e1210n1:1211_0: through the power of good deeds,
ai-anya-e1210n1:1212_0: imagining each other with all knowledges, he may reach.
ai-anya-e1210n1:1213_0: he is free from (the next) world.
ai-anya-e1210n1:1214_0: Good sirs, I’d eventually have been reborn in the underworld.
ai-anya-e1210n1:1215_0: with merit and demerit (because of) existence
ai-anya-e1210n1:1216_0: (There is) meritoriously, endowed with good qualities,
ai-anya-e1210n1:1217_0: do not heedless, who has crossed over all beings.
ai-anya-e1210n1:1218_0: you should be the Buddha, the supreme one,
ai-anya-e1210n1:1219_0: having made merit with me, other merit.’
ai-anya-e1210n1:1221_0: the great gods, men, to this great hermit:
ai-anya-e1210n1:1222_0: May they be protected by Dhamma!’
